flawed_nl_solution:
The first and last guard will take 3 + 2 = <<3+2=7>>7 hours of the night shift.
There are 9 hours in the night shift, so the middle two guards will cover 9 - 7 = <<9-7=2>>2 hours.
Each middle guard will take 2 / 2 = <<2/2=1>>1 hours.
#### 1

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 5, not 7. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
